metadata.title: CVE-2023-23586 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
Due to a vulnerability in the io_uring subsystem, it is possible to leakkernel memory information to the user process. timens_install callscurrent_is_single_threaded to determine if the current process issingle-threaded, but this call does not consider io_uring's io_workerthreads, thus it is possible to insert a time namespace's vvar page toprocess's memory space via a page fault. When this time namespace isdestroyed, the vvar page is also freed, but not removed from the process'memory, and a next page allocated by the kernel will be still availablefrom the user-space process and can leak memory contents via this(read-only) use-after-free vulnerability. We recommend upgrading pastversion 5.10.161 or commit 788d0824269bef539fe31a785b1517882eafed93https://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/stable/linux.git/commit/io_uring

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-23586` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic-64k - 5.19.0-21.21
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-kvm - 5.19.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1009-aws - 5.19.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-azure - 5.19.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-gcp - 5.19.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-ibm - 5.19.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1007-lowlatency - 5.19.0-1007.7
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1007-lowlatency-64k - 5.19.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-oracle - 5.19.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-1004-raspi - 5.19.0-1004.10
linux-image-5.19.0-1004-raspi-nolpae - 5.19.0-1004.10
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-1003-starfive - 5.19.0-1003.4
No subscription required
